item.title: Finite State Machines Backed by PostgreSQL Intro
item.description: Learn how to design and implement Finite State Machines (FSM) using PostgreSQL. This blog series covers schema design, state transitions, workflow automation, and best practices for building robust, stateful applications with PostgreSQL as the engine.
